artist: Kawase Hasui; Published by Doi Sadaichi; Carved by Katsumura Shōzō; Printed by Matsushita Shigeru
marks: right margin: 昭和七年四月作 {Shōwa shichinen shigatsu sa LRC: 巴水 {Hasui}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Not a single nail was used in the construction of the 13 meter high stage of Kiyomizu Temple that was assembled in the batten structure (kakezukuri), known since about the 13th century.
title: Spring Snow, Kiyomizu Temple in Kyōto
